item.content:encoded:
Knee Surgery Get Well Humorous Card Welder Cartoon

Hot Deals! Knee Surgery Get Well Humorous Card Welder Cartoon – Get Well Cards This item is trending! Knee Surgery Get Well Humorous Card Welder Cartoon help you save during this period Knee Surgery Get Well Humorous Card Welder Cartoon It’s in stock and ready to ship.This funny get well card is perfect for someone with a knee injury, replacement, or surgery. It has a cartoon welder welding a knee.
—–
Inside, the greeting card says Get Weld Soon. There is room in the template for you to add a personalized message. Or delete it to leave it blank, and sign it later.
—–
You can change the font style or color, or add a background color. You can also select a different size of greeting card.
—–
Give this as get well wishes after an operation or illness. Even better if the patient is a welder, or into construction, welding, or a handyman, carpenter, plumber, or other worker.
—–
See more humorous get well cards at Feel Better Cards. Price:$4.97
